org.metrobots.util

Class MetroGamepad

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.metrobots.util.MetroGamepad

  • public class MetroGamepad
extends Object
    Class which makes the Joystick class easier to use

    Feb 5: Refactored. Also, added Javadocs - Cameron
